Summary: At 6:55pm on Oct 24 2011 I saw what appeared to be a star moving from a Southwest to a Southeast direction.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my backyard waiting for my dog to do his thing I gazed up into the Norther sky and noticed a commercial jet flying South. I was looking in a Southwest direction. I just happened to take my eyes off the plane and saw what looked like a star, but it was moving. That's when I noticed it. At first I thought it might be a satellite or the ISS. It was bluish white, I couldn't make out any structure, but there were no hazard or warning lights blinking. Using the horizon as the six oclock position, it was at 3oclock moving from Southwest to the South. My feeling was oh no here we go again, I have seen similar objects in the past, totaling 4 times, I even videotaped one event that happened July of 2010. I lost sight of the object as it headed south. It just seemed to fly off in the distance. This all took place in about 12 to 15 seconds.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around October 24th 2011
